Reviews.Content: Loved the Puri Mesari       puri mesari restaurant
Reviews.Author: Sphnix

Reviews.Content: Secret Hideaway When we first arrived at this hotel it seemed a little out the way and the courtyard leading up to the hotel was a little grubby and unkempt. The next morning we were greated by the most quiet peacfull little hotel i have evet stayed in. The staff were great the rooms were kept clean and the overall ambiance was fantastic. The only drawback was that the taxi drivers could never find it and that you were a 10 minute walk from the beach, but none of these stopped us enjoying this wonderfull hotel on a truly stupendous island.
Reviews.Author: Greyday
